'''None Stand Secure''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to force the [[Geo Hypostasis]] into its revival state without destroying any Basalt Columns.

==Notes==
* Characters that wield a Bow or Catalyst are able to reach the hypostasis while it's above the columns.
